statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{4 \, x^{3} + 3 \, x^{2} + x - 2 , -5 \, x^{3} - 6 \, x^{2} + x + 1 , -6 \, x^{3} - 3 \, x^{2} - 5 \, x + 5 , 7 \, x^{3} + 20 \, x^{2} + 3 \, x + 5 , -4 \, x^{3} + x^{2} + 3 \, x + 4\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
